name: Codemasters F1 2019 Bridge
shortDescription: C# Bridge for streaming Codemasters F1 2019 telemetry to Quix
longDescription: C# Bridge for streaming Codemasters F1 2019 telemetry to Quix. This bridge is capable of streaming the game's telemetry (PC or Console). **It is intended to be run on a pc on your local network and not deployed within Quix**
